entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:24 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
